review: Easy to use and much better viewing than old system with blue ray dvd.
author: AJ

review: It works really well.  I have an older HD t.v. with only one HDMI port so I had to buy a splitter but no big deal.  It was VERY easy to install and so far as worked well.  I should have probably looked deeper into the free movies/tv selections from Amazon Prime as most of the selections don't fit my tastes but that's me.  For the price, I would and have recommended it to friends.
author: Richard Greer

review: The Fire Stick is amazing!!!  I'm stupid about computers. I needed to watch Netflix on the TV without being confused.  LAN adapters are too complicated and I'm too lazy to set up my Wii.  I bought this, I plugged it in, and then it worked!!!  Even my mom can work it and she doesn't even understand what wifi is.
